customers.title: Customers
customers.description: An array of objects, each representing a customer of a store.

id.title: Customer Foreign ID
id.description: A unique identifier for the customer.

opt_in_status.title: Opt-in Status
opt_in_status.description: The customer's opt-in status. This value will never overwrite the opt-in status of a pre-existing Mailchimp list member, but will apply to list members that are added through the e-commerce API endpoints. Customers who don't opt in to your Mailchimp list [will be added as `Transactional` members](https://mailchimp.com/developer/marketing/docs/e-commerce/#customers).

total_spent.title: Total Spent
total_spent.description: The total amount the customer has spent.

address1.title: Address Field 1
address1.description: The mailing address of the customer.

address2.title: Address Field 2
address2.description: An additional field for the customer's mailing address.

city.title: City
city.description: The city the customer is located in.

province.title: Province
province.description: The customer's state name or normalized province.

province_code.title: Province Code
province_code.description: The two-letter code for the customer's province or state.

postal_code.title: Postal Code
postal_code.description: The customer's postal or zip code.

country_code.title: Country Code
country_code.description: The two-letter code for the customer's country.

created_at.title: Creation Time
created_at.description: The date and time the customer was created in ISO 8601 format.

updated_at.title: Update Time
updated_at.description: The date and time the customer was last updated in ISO 8601 format.

_links.title: Links
_links.description: A list of link types and descriptions for the API schema documents.

items.title: Resource Link
items.description: This object represents a link from the resource where it is found to another resource or action that may be performed.

rel.title: Rel
rel.description: As with an HTML 'rel' attribute, this describes the type of link.

href.title: Href
href.description: This property contains a fully-qualified URL that can be called to retrieve the linked resource or perform the linked action.

method.title: Method
method.description: The HTTP method that should be used when accessing the URL defined in 'href'.

targetSchema.title: Target Schema
targetSchema.description: For GETs, this is a URL representing the schema that the response should conform to.

schema.title: Schema
schema.description: For HTTP methods that can receive bodies (POST and PUT), this is a URL representing the schema that the body should conform to.

total_items.title: Item Count
total_items.description: The total number of items matching the query regardless of pagination.
